LanguageData.VPE_Bliss.stages.0.label: bliss
LanguageData.VPE_Bliss.stages.1.label: bliss
LanguageData.VPE_Bliss.stages.1.description: I think things are getting better.
LanguageData.VPE_Bliss.stages.2.label: bliss
LanguageData.VPE_Bliss.stages.2.description: Everything is improving, slowly but surely.
LanguageData.VPE_Bliss.stages.3.label: bliss
LanguageData.VPE_Bliss.stages.3.description: I'm feeling good right now, things are looking up.
LanguageData.VPE_Bliss.stages.4.label: bliss
LanguageData.VPE_Bliss.stages.4.description: I feel warm and fuzzy, just being alive feels great.
LanguageData.VPE_Bliss.stages.5.label: bliss
LanguageData.VPE_Bliss.stages.5.description: I'm just about to burst with excitement. I love this colony, I love this world and all the lives on it.
LanguageData.VPE_Bliss.stages.6.label: bliss
LanguageData.VPE_Bliss.stages.6.description: All the colors of this world are so vivid, the sounds are so tranquil, the air is so crisp. This life leaves me breathless.
LanguageData.VPE_Bliss.stages.7.label: bliss
LanguageData.VPE_Bliss.stages.7.description: This is it, isn't it? I've truly reached nirvana itself. Life itself is the very embodiment of happiness.
LanguageData.VPE_MindWiped.stages.0.label: mind wiped
LanguageData.VPE_MindWiped.stages.0.description: I don’t remember anything, I’m exploring everything anew!
LanguageData.VPE_TimeQuake.stages.0.label: time quake
LanguageData.VPE_TimeQuake.stages.0.description: Everyone I knew has changed so much. This timequake really did a number on me.
LanguageData.VPE_Future.stages.0.label: I know my future!
LanguageData.VPE_Future.stages.0.description: I know my future, and things are looking good!
LanguageData.VPE_Thrall.stages.0.label: Thrall
